skills.name: Mega Smash
skills.description: Attacks with magical powers and inflicts continuous damage for 2 turns with a 50% chance. The damage increases according to Attack Speed.

skill_effect.name: Continuous DMG
skill_effect.description: Deals 5% of monster's max HP as damage every turn

skills.name: Triple Crush
skills.description: Attacks the enemy 3 times with magic and weakens the Defense for 2 turns with a 50% chance for each attack.

skill_effect.name: Multiple Hits
skill_effect.description: Attack hits more than 1 time per use.

skills.name: Elemental King (Passive)
skills.description: Always gains attribute advantage when attacking an enemy. When you receive fatal attacks, you will be immune to death for 1 turn. [Automatic Effect]

skill_effect.name: Auto Effect
skill_effect.description: The skill effect is automatically triggered.

skill_effect.name: Endure
skill_effect.description: Monster temporarily cannot be killed as HP cannot go below 1
